alert.note: Alert for Bell; Coryell; Lampasas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 16 at 5:49PM CDT until March 16 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CORYELL...SOUTHEASTERN LAMPASAS AND NORTHWESTERN BELL COUNTIES... At 549 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Copperas Cove, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Killeen, Copperas Cove, Harker Heights, Gatesville, Fort Hood, Fort Gates, Stillhouse Hollow Lake, South Mountain, Topsey, Rumley and Pidcoke. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Texas.
